/cache/tests/ -> administration_helper_test.php (summary)

[Source view] [Print] [Project Stats]

PHPunit tests for the cache API and in particular things in locallib.php This file is part of Moodle's cache API, affectionately called MUC. It contains the components that are requried in order to use caching.
